SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.types

Interface Translator<C extends FDSConfig,D>

Type Parameters:
C - the type of configuration extending FDSConfig
D - the type of dosage field to be translated
All Known Subinterfaces:
AdditionalInstruction<C,D>, AsNeeded<C,D>, BoundsDuration<C,D>, BoundsPeriod<C,D>, BoundsRange<C,D>, CountCountMax<C,D>, DayOfWeek<C,D>, DurationDurationMax<C,D>, FrequencyFrequencyMax<C,D>, FrequencyFrequencyMaxPeriodPeriodMax<C,D>, MaxDosePerAdministration<C,D>, MaxDosePerLifetime<C,D>, MaxDosePerPeriod<C,D>, OffsetWhen<C,D>, PeriodPeriodMax<C,D>, RateQuantity<C,D>, RateRange<C,D>, RateRatio<C,D>, TimeOfDay<C,D>, TimingEvent<C,D>, TranslatorTiming<C,D>
public interface Translator<C extends FDSConfig,D>
Interface for translating dosage fields into human-readable representations. This class provides base functionality for configuration and resource bundle handling, while requiring subclasses to define specific translation behavior.
Author:
jy95

    Description
    CompletableFuture<String>
    convert(D dosage)
    Converts a dosage field into a human-readable string representation asynchronously.
    default boolean
    isPresent(D dosage)
    Checks whether a dosage field is present and can be converted to a string.

  • Method Details

    • convert

      CompletableFuture<String> convert(D dosage)
      Converts a dosage field into a human-readable string representation asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      dosage - the dosage field to be converted
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that will complete with the human-readable string

    • isPresent

      default boolean isPresent(D dosage)
      Checks whether a dosage field is present and can be converted to a string.
      Parameters:
      dosage - the dosage field to check
      Returns:
      true if the dosage field is present, false otherwise
